name: Rent Ninja: HLGJAM
description:
Toshi é um ninja de aluguel, e recebe a missão de acabar com a Gang dos Boleiros que está enganando o consumidor com bolos bombas na cidade.

---

Toshi is a ninja rentals, and given a mission to end the Gang of Boleiros you're fooling the consumer with cakes bombs in the city.

---
Controls

AWSD and Arrow Keys - Movement
Ctrl or Left-mouse Button = Shurikens
Space = Jump
Space + W or UP Key = Super Jump
Esc = Pause
